description:
Learn how to create PowerPoint presentations in the newest version of Microsoft Office. MicrosoftÂ PowerPoint 2016 for Beginners takes you through the PowerPoint 2016 interface and shows you how to create unique and interesting presentations using the software. By the end of this course, you'll be familiar with most of the features of the program and should be able to create PowerPoint presentations for your class, work, or home needs.

We'll be covering the following topics in this course

  • The different types of Slide Layouts and how they apply to your presentations
  • Text and Font Options
  • Templates and making or modifying your own custom templates.
  • How to add shapes, sounds, transitions, and animations to your slides
  • What all the different options do in PowerPoint
  • And much more!
title: Introduction to PowerPoint 2016: Tutorials for Beginners
